ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
objective: Aims to improve the productivity and income of women farmers by promoting sustainable agriculture practices and livelihood options.
women_focus: Provides training, tools, and support to small and marginal women farmers.

ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
objective: Encourages women farmers to take leadership roles in agriculture and promotes skills training.
women_focus: Focuses on women’s agricultural leadership and modern farming practices.

ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
objective: Provides financial assistance to pregnant women for institutional delivery under the National Health Mission.
women_focus: Targets below-poverty-line (BPL) women to promote safe motherhood.

ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
objective: Offers a cash incentive of ₹5,000 to pregnant and lactating women to improve maternal health and nutrition.
women_focus: Encourages institutional delivery and reduces infant mortality.

objective: Recognizes outstanding contributions by women across diverse sectors including social, economic, and leadership fields.
women_focus: Honors women achievers for exceptional work at national and community levels.

objective: Builds a bridge between police and community by engaging women as volunteers to assist in preventing crimes against women.
women_focus: Trains women to act as the first link in reporting and preventing violence.

scheme_name: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act
objective: Provides legal protection and remedies for women facing domestic violence.
women_focus: Ensures justice, protection orders, and rehabilitation support for victims.

objective: Provides subsidized loans for women entrepreneurs from rural and urban areas to start small enterprises.
women_focus: Empowers disadvantaged women through financial support and entrepreneurship.

objective: Promotes women’s participation in coir production and provides training, financial aid, and working capital support.
women_focus: Encourages women-led microenterprises in coir-based industries.

objective: Credit-linked subsidy program for self-employment and micro-enterprises with a focus on women entrepreneurs.
women_focus: Provides higher subsidy (25%) for women starting new enterprises.

ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
objective: Addresses the declining child sex ratio and promotes education and empowerment of the girl child.
women_focus: Raises awareness about the importance of girls’ education and equality.

ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
objective: Provides integrated support services to women affected by violence including shelter, legal, medical, and counselling aid.
women_focus: Ensures immediate help and safety for women in distress.

ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
objective: Empowers rural women through community participation, skill training, and advocacy.
women_focus: Strengthens local governance participation and financial inclusion.

ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
objective: Improves maternal and child health, nutrition, and early education through Anganwadi centers.
women_focus: Supports mothers and children through healthcare and nutrition programs.

objective: Promotes women’s participation and leadership in the steel industry through skill and leadership training.
women_focus: Encourages gender equality in industrial sectors traditionally led by men.

ministry: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
objective: Provides term loans up to ₹2,00,000 to backward class women entrepreneurs for self-employment.
women_focus: Encourages economic independence among socially disadvantaged women.

ministry: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
objective: Microfinance support for backward-class women entrepreneurs via SHGs.
women_focus: Supports self-help groups of women for entrepreneurship and livelihoods.

objective: Supports women scientists returning to research through fellowships and grants.
women_focus: Encourages women’s participation in STEM research and innovation.

scheme_name: SERB-POWER (Promoting Opportunities for Women in Exploratory Research)
objective: Funds women researchers to reduce gender disparity in science and engineering.
women_focus: Promotes women’s participation in national-level R&D programs.

ministry: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
objective: Provides structured training and awareness for aspiring women entrepreneurs.
women_focus: Introduces entrepreneurship as a viable career path for women students.

ministry: Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas
objective: Provides free LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households.
women_focus: Improves women’s health and safety by reducing exposure to smoke.

objective: Facilitates loans from ₹10 lakh to ₹1 crore for women entrepreneurs to set up enterprises.
women_focus: Promotes inclusion and supports women-led startups.

objective: Offers collateral-free loans up to ₹10 lakh to micro and small enterprises, including women entrepreneurs.
women_focus: Encourages women-led micro-businesses through easy credit.

scheme_name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
objective: Guarantees 100 days of paid employment to rural households annually.
women_focus: Ensures one-third of beneficiaries are women to promote equality.

objective: Provides mentorship, funding access, and networking for women entrepreneurs.
women_focus: Builds a national ecosystem supporting women-led startups.

objective: Empowers women SHG members by providing ICT-enabled services like mobile repair and solar charging.
women_focus: Promotes digital literacy and women’s access to technology.

objective: Empowers rural women through education and collective learning.
women_focus: Encourages lifelong learning and participation in governance.

scheme_name: Support to Tribal Women for Skill Development
objective: Provides vocational training to tribal women in weaving, crafts, and agriculture.
women_focus: Empowers tribal women to earn livelihoods through traditional skills.

scheme_name: Development for Women in Traditional Crafts
objective: Supports skill development for women artisans in handloom, khadi, and handicrafts.
women_focus: Enhances income and preserves traditional Indian crafts.

objective: Ensures safety and support for women passengers through dedicated teams.
women_focus: Promotes safe travel and assistance for women passengers.

objective: Trains women leaders at Gram Panchayat level to enhance participation.
women_focus: Promotes women’s leadership in rural governance.

objective: Women and Climate Change Initiative
women_focus: Addresses gender-specific challenges of women in climate change.
income_min: Promotes women as leaders in climate resilience.

objective: National Livestock Mission (NLM)

income_min: Promotes self-reliance of women in livestock farming.

objective: Promotes women’s participation in sports and provides training and facilities.

objective: Supports women-led cooperative societies with financial aid and credit linkage.
women_focus: Improves socio-economic status of women in cooperatives.

objective: Encourages women to join aviation careers with scholarships and mentorship.

objective: Empowers women entrepreneurs through capacity building in Tier-II/III cities.
women_focus: Promotes women’s leadership in business through training and networking.

objective: Collaborates with MWCD to improve nutrition among girls and pregnant women through AYUSH-based interventions.

objective: Provides leadership training and financial literacy to women from minority communities.
women_focus: Empowers minority women to become community leaders.
